name: Demon of Truth
description:
This game was made in Unity for Community Game Jam (2019) in 1 week with the theme of "The game is a liar".

In this puzzle-platformer-like 3D game you have to collect all keys and return them to the main temple. During your jurney, a friendly demon will help you with different informations to reach your goal.

The game contains 5 levels, with increasing difficulty, last level is for experts. Can you complete it?
